body: @Lil'Lolicon-san, she was joking. she mentioned it in a canon case that she was OLD but she's actually just a year older than him. she's 18 :)))

Havent read a page of OG D.C in my life, but isnt Haibara a little too old for our Kudo-kun? Ive heard and concluded from the D.C doujinshi that ive read that shes like at least 30-35+ or sth. *Cougar* if you might. / Also, shes third-wheeling so hard dou, poor her.
